sn12.17:7.1: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr) | bhikkhū → bhikkhū ākaṅkhamānā (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
sn12.17:8.1: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj); accayena parivutthaparivāse (sya-all, km); accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr) | bhikkhū → bhikkhū ākaṅkhamānā (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr) | catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena → accayena parivutthaparivāsaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); accayena parivuṭṭhaparivāsaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
